<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=3599) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882); Expert in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) or Expert in [Undead Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

You regularly face off against [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and can identify many with a glance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on skill checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about undead. Whenever you roll a critical failure on a check to Recall Knowledge about undead, you get a failure instead.
